org.apereo.cas

接口 CipherExecutor<T,R>

  • 类型参数:
    T - the type parameter
    R - the type parameter

    public interface CipherExecutor<T,R>
    Responsible to define operation that deal with encryption, signing and verification of a value.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.1

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      R decode(T value)
      Decode the value.
      R encode(T value)
      Encrypt the value.
      java.lang.String getName()
      The (component) name of this cipher.
      boolean isEnabled()
      Supports encryption of values.

    • 方法详细资料

      • encode

        R encode(T value)
        Encrypt the value. Implementations may choose to also sign the final value.
        参数:
        value - the value
        返回:
        the encrypted value or null

      • decode

        R decode(T value)
        Decode the value. Signatures may also be verified.
        参数:
        value - encrypted value
        返回:
        the decoded value.

      • isEnabled

        boolean isEnabled()
        Supports encryption of values.
        返回:
        true/false

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        The (component) name of this cipher.
        返回:
        the name.
